thread.title: Loren Burns
thread.title_full: RC Willey reviewed by Loren Burns

author: Loren Burns
title: Loren Burns
text: All went well with the purchase and delivery. I would mention one thing about the product. It is a Hancock Park office desk and hutch,SKU# 110282523, Model# H3681. The top center shelf has a glass insert.After unpacking the glass insert, I discovered the shelf had been installed upside down. In order to install the glass insert I had to remove 4 screws and turn the shelf over. The only negative effect is the shelf has 4 small screw holes on the top side that are above eye level.
